com.massivecraft.factions

Class MassiveStats

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.massivecraft.factions.MassiveStats
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.bukkit.event.Listener

    public class MassiveStats
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.bukkit.event.Listener
    MassiveStats collects plugin and server information for plugin authors. You can learn more at our website: https://www.massivestats.com/

    • Field Summary

      static java.lang.String API_URL

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      com.massivecraft.factions.MassiveStatsDataResponse getLastResponse()
      Returns the contents of the last response from the MassiveStats server.
      int getPingInterval()
      Returns the duration, in seconds, that MassiveStats will wait before sending another request to the server.
      org.bukkit.plugin.java.JavaPlugin getPlugin()
      Returns the plugin that this MassiveStats instance is collecting data for.
      boolean isListenerDisabled()
      Gets whether or not the built-in MassiveStats PlayerJoinEvent listener is enabled.
      void onPlayerJoin(org.bukkit.event.player.PlayerJoinEvent event) 
      void setListenerDisabled(boolean listenerDisabled)
      Sets whether or not the built-in MassiveStats PlayerJoinEvent listener is enabled.
      void setPingInterval(int pingInterval)
      Sets the duration, in seconds, that MassiveStats should wait before sending another request to the server.
      void start()
      Start the MassiveStats reporting timer.
      void stop()
      Stop the MassiveStats reporting timer.

    • Method Detail

      • isListenerDisabled

        public boolean isListenerDisabled()
        Gets whether or not the built-in MassiveStats PlayerJoinEvent listener is enabled.
        Returns:
        Whether or not the MassiveStats listener is enabled.

      • setListenerDisabled

        public void setListenerDisabled(boolean listenerDisabled)
        Sets whether or not the built-in MassiveStats PlayerJoinEvent listener is enabled.
        Parameters:
        listenerDisabled - Whether or not the MassiveStats listener is enabled.

      • start

        public void start()
        Start the MassiveStats reporting timer. If the timer is already running, this method will do nothing.

      • stop

        public void stop()
        Stop the MassiveStats reporting timer. Requests will no longer be sent to the server - or until start() is invoked.

      • getPingInterval

        public int getPingInterval()
        Returns the duration, in seconds, that MassiveStats will wait before sending another request to the server.
        Returns:
        Duration between requests.

      • setPingInterval

        public void setPingInterval(int pingInterval)
        Sets the duration, in seconds, that MassiveStats should wait before sending another request to the server.
        Parameters:
        pingInterval - Duration between requests.

      • getPlugin

        public org.bukkit.plugin.java.JavaPlugin getPlugin()
        Returns the plugin that this MassiveStats instance is collecting data for.
        Returns:
        MassiveStats instance plugin.

      • getLastResponse

        public com.massivecraft.factions.MassiveStatsDataResponse getLastResponse()
        Returns the contents of the last response from the MassiveStats server.
        Returns:
        MassiveStats server response.

        public void onPlayerJoin(org.bukkit.event.player.PlayerJoinEvent event)
